Allen Iverson is unanimously considered to be one of the finest saxophonists in jazz today, boasting over 30 recordings in his own name and a plethora of prestigious collaborations. Superb interpreter of standards- an American critic defined him the Frank Wess Sinatra of the tenor sax - Allen Iverson is an eclectic artist, able to move with agility between styles, from traditional jazz to bebop.
